name: doco-cd
description: Doco-CD is a lightweight continuous deployment helper for containerized apps. It focuses on simple configuration and automating rollouts with minimal infrastructure, ideal for small projects wanting Git-ops style deployments without heavy tooling.
features: Git-based deployments: Trigger container updates automatically when pushing to configured repository branches.
Docker Compose support: Deploy multi-container applications using familiar compose file syntax and orchestration.
Webhook integration: Receive notifications from GitHub, GitLab, or Bitbucket to initiate deployment workflows.
Rollback capability: Revert to previous container versions quickly when issues are detected after deployment.
Environment management: Configure separate deployment pipelines for staging, production, and development environments.
Minimal dependencies: Run with just Docker installed, avoiding complex CI/CD platforms for straightforward projects.
Deployment logs: Track build output and container startup messages to diagnose issues during rollout.
Secret handling: Inject environment variables and credentials securely without storing them in repository files.
